usefulItems: 12 hole muffin tin, muffin paper cases, oven
title: Blueberry Muffins

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C and arrange paper muffin cases in a 12 hole muffin tin.
Place butter, sugar, flour, milk, vanilla extract, eggs, baking powder and salt in mixing bowl then mix <b>20 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer mixture to muffin cases, filling each case ⅔ full.
Scatter blueberries over top then stir in gently with a spoon. Bake for 30-35 minutes (180°C) until cooked and golden. Allow to cool before removing from tin and serving.

hintsAndTricks: If you don't have paper muffin cases available, grease and flour muffin moulds or use a silicone muffin mould instead.
